thx for UpL, 
so i was thinkging,, since there are no comments in all your UpL, mybe you can add a sample so that we can rate for you, what do you think?

Hello Riyadhgirl ... most of my uploads are of dvd quality and i feel confident that the same will be appreciated by those downloading the movies i put up ... I really do this so that others with limited knowledge of english can enjoy movies as much as i do ... i am not doing thid to be rated ... but all the same ... thank u for ur comments ... Have  great day ... as hard as that can be in riyadh ... lol
